title: Health, Fitness and Beauty | FlexPay
summary: FlexPay's Invisible Recovery™ solution helps health, fitness, and beauty companies reduce churn and maximize revenue by intelligently recovering failed payments. It optimizes the recovery strategy for each transaction, leading to significant revenue growth and improved customer lifetime value.
key_points: Reduces customer churn and dissatisfaction caused by failed payments.
Maximizes revenue through industry-best failed payment recovery rates.
AI-Powered Invisible Recovery™ optimizes strategies for each failed transaction.
Aims for an average 33% increase in total revenue collected in the first 12 months.
